QuestData.Title: Invading the Citadel
QuestData.Description: With the Legion to one side and the fel orcs to the other, Thrallmar is going to be overrun if we don't do something about it.$B$BHead west to the Hellfire Ramparts and speak with Stone Guard Stok'ton. He's in charge of a covert operation to start a Horde invasion on the entire citadel.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Stone Guard Stok'ton in Hellfire Ramparts.
